name: Pawrence of Arabia (LindyGreen, Zipyann, Sangoro, Thom13made, ShatteredReality, erebrus)
name_original: Pawrence of Arabia (LindyGreen, Zipyann, Sangoro, Thom13made, ShatteredReality, erebrus)
description:
NOTE: The WebGL version has some bugs with the jump/shoot control. Download the Windows version for a better experience!

"Get ready to embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey with Pawrence of Arabia, the heroic feline on a mission to save the day! Armed with his trusty blunderbuss, he'll take on a horde of rats to protect the sacred statue of Bastet. With non-stop action and epic boss battles (coming soon), this game will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end. So buckle up and prepare for the ride of your life, as you help Pawrence become the hero the town deserves!"
